questions.question: Mount Everest is the …………………….peak in the world.
questions.description: The superlative indicates the highest degree.

questions.question: Mount Everest is …………………… than any other peak in the world.
questions.description: We use a comparative adjective before the expression than.

questions.question: Sachin is …………………… famous than any other Indian cricketer.
questions.description: We use a comparative adjective before the expression than.

questions.question: Lead is …………………….. metal.
questions.description: The article the is used before superlative adjectives.

questions.question: No other metal is as …………………… as lead.
questions.description: Positive adjectives are used in the construction as …as…

questions.question: Mayank is …………………….. than any other boy in the class.
questions.description: We use a comparative adjective before the expression than.

questions.question: Preeti is …………………… girl in the class.
questions.description: We use the superlative to compare one person or thing with the whole group to which that person or thing belongs.

questions.question: Lotus is …………………….. than any other flower.
The peacock is one of the ……………………. birds.
